notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Naɗɗude maa maaɗo woodaani e jammai 7 nguuru
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Naɗɗude maa fof e dowrow maa maaɗo woodaani e jammai 7 nguuru, won e nder goonga nde maa woodaani am, walla maa waylude ko. Nana-ɗo naɗɗude maa ɗoo.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Naɗɗude maa fof e ɓe maa maaɗo woodaani e jammai 7 nguuru, won e nder goonga nde maa woodaani am, walla maa waylude ko. Nana-ɗo naɗɗude maa ɗoo.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Dobo e dowrow ɗoo ɗoo, naatnu e aminoojo e huutoraade Maamu Kadiijaani e ñiiɓirde.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Ɓoƴƴere e mum ena woodi e 75% ɓoƴɗo e ɓeɓɓe
email.possibleFraudInformation: Sistem maa maaɗo woodi mum ena woodi e ɓeɓɓe. Maa waawi ɗaɓɓanii e Maamu Dowrow. Mum ena woodi e ɓeɓɓe e mum ena woodi e ɓeɓɓe e ɓeɓɓe, ngam humpitde naatde e mum ena woodi e ɓeɓɓe.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Naɗɗude maa maaɗo woodi e AI e ɓeɓɓe e ɓeɓɓe. Maa waawi maa waylude naɗɗude maa so tawii.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: AI maaɗo woodi e ɓeɓɓe e ɓeɓɓe e naɗɗude maa. AI maaɗo ɗaɓɓanii e ɓeɓɓe e ɓeɓɓe, ɓeɓɓe, ɓeɓɓe, e ɓeɓɓe. Maa waawi maa waylude naɗɗude maa so tawii.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: So tuma AI algoritm mbiyaata e pottiral ɗoo, ko ɗum waɗi, aɗa mbaɗi yimɓe, tawii ko aɗa mbaɗi no feere nde e jaɓɓaama eɗen ngal.
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Eɗen ɗoo ko ɗaɓɓaama e njiɗi ndee

email.user_invite_2: Dobo e jokkol walla ɗaɓɓitaako e njaalawu adreese dow to aminde
email.reset_password_1: Nanɗo to linki sosde finnde mum.
email.reset_password_2: So tiiɗno eɗen ngoo, alaa kaɗa maa wallude e-mail ɗoo.
email.reset_password_3: Finnde maa woni ko wonande nde araani eɓɓonde eɗen ngol laaɓtude ɗoo e haalirde ɗum ena woodi.
